amendment.description: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to add a Sense of Congress that the U.S. should prioritize the safe return of all Americans, including those wrongfully held by foreign governments, and provide assistance to foreign individuals detained abroad that have contributed to U.S. national security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crow amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Crow.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crow amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
